div.p: M.P.E. conducted most of the CM2.1 and CESM simulations and conducted the bulk of the analysis. C.S.J. provided additional analysis and feedback, A.J.B. provided guidance for some model simulations and analysis, and D.W.L. provided insight about the choice of proxy records. P.J.V. ran the HadCM3 simulations, M.C. conducted analysis of climate emulator results, and P.N.D. ran the CESM ice sheets simulation and an additional preindustrial simulation.
